Name: Lonely Trip
About the game: STORY In the deep universe, thereâ€™s a special planet. On this planet, lives a mysterious little creature who has two green leaves on its head and the great power to change the gravity around it. One day, a rift appears in the sky, something fallen from the rift with the dazzling light shining like a meteor. Seeing this, the little one decides to start the journey and find out what happened. FEATURES Rotate the worlds to solve puzzles and avoid dangers, lead the little monster to the destination safely. CHALLENGING LEVELS Dark forest, waste lands and freezing plains. Various kinds of levels and items to make your journey fulfilled with challenge.
